meanings.definition: Having a single opening or mouth.
meanings.sent1: The monostome fish only has one mouth to eat with.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the monostome creature with great interest.
meanings.sent3: The monostome alien in the movie could only communicate through its single mouth.
meanings.sent4: Her monostome car only had one exhaust pipe, making it unique on the road.
meanings.sent5: The monostome flower bloomed with a single, beautiful petal.

meanings.definition: An organism with a single opening for both ingestion and excretion.
meanings.sent1: The monostome in the pond fascinated the young biologist.
meanings.sent2: The monostome's digestive system was unlike any other creature's.
meanings.sent3: The monostome at the zoo amused visitors with its unusual feeding habits.
meanings.sent4: The monostome of the deep sea was a marvel of nature's efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The monostome's single opening served both as a mouth and an exit point.
